short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will fill user-inputed information into the disered checkout form.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension houses a user input form that stores user data. Once the user has navigated to the checkout page of the desired form, the data will be retrieved and filled into the form automatically.
